name: title
label: Title
default: FAQs

name: subtitle
label: Subtitle
default: Find answers to common questions about our services. Get quick and clear information to help you get started.

children.name: answer
children.label: Answer
children.default: Answer text goes here. Provide a clear and concise response to the frequently asked question. Make sure the answer addresses common customer concerns while offering helpful information. Include details that guide users effectively, keeping your tone friendly and supportive. End with a note that encourages further engagement if they need additional assistance or details.
